fields.notice_name: Chapter Membership Expiration Notice 7 Days Before Expiration
fields.subject: Chapter Membership Expiration Notice
fields.email_content:
Dear {{ first_name }},

Your chapter membership with for {{ name }} with {{ site_display_name }} will expire in 7 days.

To renew your chapter membership visit {{ renew_link }}

Thank you!


{{ site_contact_name }}
{{ site_display_name }}

fields.subject: Chapter Membership Approval with {{ site_display_name }} for {{ chapter_name }}
fields.email_content:
Dear {{ first_name }},

Thank you for your chapter membership application to join {{ chapter_name }} with {{ site_display_name }}.

Your application for {{ membership_type }} has been processed and approved.

To view and update your application, please go to {{ view_link }}.

 

Thanks!

{{ chapter_name }}

{{ site_display_name }}

fields.subject: Thank You for Your {{ chapter_name }} Chapter Membership Renewal with {{ site_display_name }}
fields.email_content:
Dear {{ first_name }},

Your {{ chapter_name }} chapter membership renewal with {{ site_display_name }} has been received. You'll be notified once your application has been reviewed and approved.

To view your application, please go to {{ view_link }}.

 

Thanks!

{{ site_display_name }}
